DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( medical research study participant researcher tell treatment participant receive , `` unblinded '' ) , multi-center randomized ( study drug assign chance ) study compare effectiveness safety tramadol HCl 37.5 mg/acetaminophen 325 mg gabapentin participant diabetic neuropathy . The study consist 4 period : Screening period ( Day -14 ) , Randomization period ( Day 1 ) , Dosage adjustment period ( Day 15 ) Maintenance period ( Day 43 ) . The participant randomly assign 1 2 treatment group : tramadol HCl 37.5 mg/acetaminophen 325 mg gabapentin . Tramadol Hcl/acetaminophen group receive 1 tablet 3 day , 1 tablet twice daily 4 day follow 1 tablet thrice daily next 7 day . If pain relief , dosage increase 8 tablet per day Day 15 28 , increase dosage maintain Day 29 42 . Gabapentin group receive 300 mg Day 1 , 300 mg twice daily Day 2 , 300 mg thrice daily Day 3 7 . Then Day 8 14 , participant receive 300 mg morning , 300 mg midday 600 mg evening . If pain relief , gabapentin increase 3600 mg per day Day 15 28 , increase dosage maintain Day 29 42 . Primarily , efficacy evaluate pain intensity use numeric rating scale ( NRS ) . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
